name: commander-v
description: Concatenates multiple files with an ASCII tree view of your project. For humans who need to fix your code and AIs who need to fix theirs.

commanderV.asciiTreePrepend.description: Prepend an ASCII tree of the directory structure to the copied content.

commanderV.asciiTreeMaxDepth.description: The maximum depth of directories to include in the generated ASCII tree.

commanderV.ignoreFile.description: Path to the file containing patterns to exclude from the generated ASCII tree. A .gitignore file is usually ag

commanderV.prependFileComment.description: The opening comment shown at the beginning of every file. Use $path as a placeholder for the file path.

commanderV.appendFileComment.description: The closing comment shown at the end of every file. Use $path as a placeholder for the file path.

commanderV.playDoneSound.description: Play a sound when operations are successfully completed and output has been moved to you clipboard.
